UniprotID	Q9NX76
Accession	Q9NX76;Q6IAC4
EntryName	CKLF6_HUMAN
ProteinName	CKLF-like MARVEL transmembrane domain-containing protein 6 (Chemokine-like factor superfamily member 6)
GeneName	CMTM6 CKLFSF6
Length	183
Function	Master regulator of recycling and plasma membrane expression of PD-L1/CD274, an immune inhibitory ligand critical for immune tolerance to self and antitumor immunity. Associates with both constitutive and IFNG-induced PD-L1/CD274 at recycling endosomes, where it protects PD-L1/CD274 from being targeted for lysosomal degradation, likely by preventing its STUB1-mediated ubiquitination. May stabilize PD-L1/CD274 expression on antigen presenting cells and potentiates inhibitory signaling by PDCD1/CD279, its receptor on T-cells, ultimately triggering T-cell anergy.
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane; Early endosome membrane; Recycling endosome membrane
Disorder	0.3019,0.3704,0.4330,0.4685,0.5254,0.5296,0.5807,0.5211,0.5296,0.5342,0.5758,0.6427,0.5992,0.5758,0.4619,0.4541,0.4864,0.4831,0.3566,0.1969,0.1501,0.1399,0.1251,0.0605,0.0676,0.0300,0.0174,0.0153,0.0198,0.0133,0.0088,0.0078,0.0076,0.0057,0.0059,0.0059,0.0049,0.0042,0.0055,0.0060,0.0065,0.0064,0.0042,0.0031,0.0031,0.0031,0.0044,0.0045,0.0035,0.0034,0.0044,0.0044,0.0046,0.0034,0.0035,0.0034,0.0046,0.0046,0.0046,0.0033,0.0030,0.0044,0.0034,0.0041,0.0056,0.0056,0.0051,0.0042,0.0037,0.0036,0.0027,0.0026,0.0027,0.0019,0.0020,0.0020,0.0014,0.0011,0.0012,0.0012,0.0019,0.0032,0.0019,0.0022,0.0030,0.0031,0.0032,0.0034,0.0039,0.0060,0.0079,0.0084,0.0084,0.0119,0.0188,0.0356,0.0281,0.0281,0.0244,0.0483,0.0463,0.0433,0.0380,0.0870,0.0851,0.0433,0.0191,0.0168,0.0096,0.0080,0.0075,0.0054,0.0049,0.0034,0.0026,0.0026,0.0026,0.0037,0.0050,0.0068,0.0068,0.0093,0.0080,0.0084,0.0059,0.0070,0.0079,0.0087,0.0094,0.0083,0.0096,0.0062,0.0062,0.0076,0.0127,0.0100,0.0089,0.0056,0.0043,0.0031,0.0032,0.0020,0.0015,0.0017,0.0014,0.0015,0.0012,0.0015,0.0021,0.0027,0.0042,0.0046,0.0066,0.0099,0.0080,0.0083,0.0143,0.0209,0.0581,0.1184,0.2094,0.2064,0.3426,0.4017,0.4186,0.4186,0.4186,0.5382,0.5342,0.5854,0.4652,0.4725,0.4051,0.4017,0.3807,0.4901,0.4801,0.4766,0.4220,0.3667,0.3182,0.2783,0.2258
